resources.string: Hi there, check out my project: https://github.com/DovletAtakishiyev/currency-tracker-app

Welcome to the "Feedback and Support" section!

We value your feedback and want to improve our application to better meet your needs. If you have any questions, feedback, or issues, please share them with us. We are ready to listen and assist you!

To submit your feedback or support request, please fill out the following form:

1. Your Name:
2. Email Address:
3. Subject (brief description of your question or feedback):
4. Message (please provide detailed information about your question, issue, or suggestion):

We will strive to respond to you as soon as possible and provide a resolution or clarification. Thank you for your participation and help in enhancing our application.

Best regards,
[Your App Name] Support Team
